name: Play it again Sam 7
overview: A compilation of 4 games: Bone Cruncher a single player scrolling maze game. It was written by Martyn Howard and Andreas Kremnitz and was originally released in 1987 by Superior. FireTrack a single player scrolling space shooter. It was written by Nick Pelling and was originally released in 1987 by Electric Dreams. Ghouls (aka Ghoulies) a single player platformer. It was written by David J Hoskins and was originally released in 1983 by Micro Power (Program Power). Snapper a single player variant of the classic PacMan game. It was written by Jonathan Griffiths and was originally released in 1982 by Acornsoft.
